outline:
1. flesh, food, body, near kin, near kinswoman
    1. flesh
      1. as food
      2. for physical power (fig)
    2. flesh relation, blood relation
    3. self
kjv_def: body, flesh, food, (near) kin(-sman, -swoman), near (nigh) (of kin).
strongs_def: flesh (as swelling out), as living or forfood; generally food of any kind; figuratively, kindred by blood
